name: Princess Dress up
description:
The Caribbean Princess is back to the palace and we all love her so much. And now, can you believe it? She choose you to be her stylist. Dress up her perfectly to meet the King and have more fun. Feel the royal spirit and make her be the most beautiful princess ever, she’ll appreciate you.

**Features**
- Enjoy the game in two mode:
+ Classic mode: Dress her up to according to your taste. Choose vary of backgrounds from gallery by tapping on the icon Leaf and keeping in 2 seconds. You can pinch, zoom, rotate and move the model and background also.
+ Time mode: you will have to dress up the princess in the same way as you see it in the picture to get the highest score
- Pro hairstyles and make-up colors
- Beautiful royal dresses
- More amazing accessories incuding: shoes, more than necklaces, earrings…
- Good sound effect and nice backgrounds
- Take photos and share with people over Facebook, Twitter.. or save in gallery
